test.title: Help-Tutorials Tests

introduction.p: This menu item brings up the topic within the help system that contains tutorial help for the application.

context.p: The goal for testing this help is to check the correctness, consistency and structure of the help file. Though the step may apply to all members of one kind or another, it is not always possible to test each one. Do so randomly if all can not be done as time and probability permit. The first words of the bug report title should be a noun phrase containing the words "Help-Tutorials".

case.title: Activate
case.step:
Click Help-Tutorials.
The Tutorials dialog launches
Several links to various tutorials are in the dialog. The standard ones are tested in the cases below.
Help-Tutorials dialog fails to launch
Help-Tutorials does not have expected links

Click each link in the Tutorial dialog.
The Tutorial dialog disappears
The selected tutorial launches
Help-Tutorials dialog remains after tutorial selection
Help-Tutorials selection fails to launch
